trans-unit.source: Use the <c>AssignCulture</c> element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: 請使用專案檔中的 <c>AssignCulture</c> 元素，來建立和執行這項工作。

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [AssignCulture Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8f8314cc-82a6-4f16-a62d-b9f0d1d5e274).
trans-unit.target: 如需用法和參數資訊，請參閱 [AssignCulture 工作](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8f8314cc-82a6-4f16-a62d-b9f0d1d5e274)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.Files" /> with a <c>Culture</c> metadata entry added to each item.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <c>Culture</c> 中繼資料項目加入每個項目中的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.Files" /> 清單。

trans-unit.source: The list of <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.Files" />, with a <c>Culture</c> metadata entry added to each item.
trans-unit.target: 清單<see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.Files" />，與<c>文化特性</c>中繼資料項目加入每個項目。

trans-unit.source: If the incoming item from the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.Files%2A> property already contains a `Culture` metadata entry, the original metadata entry is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳入的項目從<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.Files%2A>屬性已包含`Culture`使用中繼資料的項目，原始中繼資料的項目。

trans-unit.source: The task only assigns a `Culture` metadata entry if the file name contains a valid culture identifier.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案名稱中包含有效的文化特性識別碼，此工作只會指派 `Culture` 中繼資料項目。

trans-unit.source: The culture identifier must be between the last two dots in the filename.
trans-unit.target: 文化特性識別碼必須介於檔案名稱的最後兩個點之間。

trans-unit.source: Gets a subset of <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> that have a <c>Culture</c> metadata entry.
trans-unit.target: 取得具有 <c>Culture</c> 中繼資料項目的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> 子集。

trans-unit.source: A subset of <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> that have a <c>Culture</c> metadata entry.
trans-unit.target: 子集<see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" />具有<c>文化特性</c>中繼資料項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a subset of <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> that do not have a <c>Culture</c> metadata entry.
trans-unit.target: 取得沒有 <c>Culture</c> 中繼資料項目的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> 子集。

trans-unit.source: A subset of <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> that do not have a <c>Culture</c> metadata entry.
trans-unit.target: 子集<see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" />沒有<c>文化特性</c>中繼資料項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a subset of <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> that do not have a <c>Culture</c> metadata entry.
trans-unit.target: 取得沒有 <c>Culture</c> 中繼資料項目的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> 子集。

trans-unit.source: A subset of <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> that do not have a <c>Culture</c> metadata entry.
trans-unit.target: 子集<see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" />沒有<c>文化特性</c>中繼資料項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if task execution succeeded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作執行成功，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of files with embedded culture names to assign a culture to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定具有要指派文化特性之內嵌文化特性名稱的檔案清單。

trans-unit.source: The list of files with embedded culture names to assign a culture to.
trans-unit.target: 具有要指派文化特性之內嵌文化特性名稱的檔案清單。
